layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x52
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x52
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x20
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20 [color=#008000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 397x19
          text run at (0,0) width 397: "This line should be green (there should be no red on this page)."
